name: table
look_description: The large mahogany table looks like it would seat a very large dinner party. The legs contain intricate scroll work, which suggests that the owner spared no expense when purchasing this table. This is a piece of furniture that was designed to impress.

smell.text: The tale smells like wood and dust.

climb on.text: You climb on top of the table. You have a great view of the room from up here. The ceiling is still too high to touch, and it's mostly obscured by shadows anyway. After nearly crushing a china plate with your foot, you decide to get off the table.

stand on.text: You climb on top of the table. You have a great view of the room from up here. The ceiling is still too high to touch, and it's mostly obscured by shadows anyway. After nearly crushing a china plate with your foot, you decide to get off the table.

sit.text: You take a seat at one of the chairs and pretend this dinner party was for you. Thankfully for you it wasn't...was it?

move.text: You try to push the table into a different position, but find that it's too heavy and seems to be stuck in place.
